MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.53am following reports of faulty electrical equipment in Murrayburn Gardens and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.02pm on the 11th of March 2021.
